title: Cruising the 'Poc
description: Alternate cover edition of ASIN B071R9QSCSThis is Book 2 of the Zournal. An adventure story taking place after the population has been decimated by a virus which turns people into blue-veined, mindless, homicidal, cannibals. Steve continues his journey to find his parents and keep his adopted family safe as they journey through Florida towards his parents Tennessee cabin. Steve continues to document the journey in his Zournal. Join in the adventure, sometimes dark, sometimes funny, always interesting.
author: R.S. Merritt
